name: Senior Fullstack Developer
description:
TeamDirector is an American company that develops cutting-edge solutions for user activity monitoring, data loss prevention, and user behavior analytics to satisfy the needs of our customers most of which are well-known companies in various industries both private and governmental form of ownership.

We are looking for a Senior Fullstack Developer.

We offer full-time, remote work.

Requirements:
- 2+ years experience with Node.js and Angular (we're migrating: 1.x -> 2.0+)
- Experience with: PostgreSQL (or any SQL database), Redis, Nginx
- Ability to learn and implement new knowledge
- Proficient knowledge of GIT
- Technical English level: Intermediate and higher. No verbal skills required
- Good communication skills

Will be a plus:
- Experience with PHP, Python, ClickHouse, Perl, Docker
- Team leader ambitions

Our benefits:
- Participation in the development of world-class B2B software
- Russian-speaking engineering team
- Company’s remote teamwork mindset long before it became a mainstream
- Working according to your local business hours
- Minimum of bureaucracy
- Competitive compensation
- Payments directly to your bank account
- Vacations, sick leaves
